name: REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., petitioners, v. Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., petitioners,
v.
Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.
casebody.head_matter:
REPUBLIC OF SUDAN, et al., petitioners,
v.
Monicah Okoba OPATI, In Her Own Right, as Executrix of the Estate of Caroline Setla Opati, Deceased, et al.
No. 17-1406.
Supreme Court of the United States
June 11, 2018.
The Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the view of the United States.
